name: Quick-headers
body:
# QuickHeaders (Add in for MS Outlook 2010)
## by Jimbo Esposito 04.01.12
 							
Allows quick access to e-mail message headers from within the MS Outlook 
inspector.  Simply right-click and choose "Show Headers" on any message,
 without having to select it or read it first.

Coded in C# using Microsoft Visual Studio 2010
Project Type: Outlook 2010 Add-In

Send feedback to morganconsulting@hotmail.com RE: QuickHeaders

Hope you like it!
tagline: An Outlook 2010 Add-In that makes it easy to view a message's headers, without having to read the message.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
